tool_description: Validates compatibility between replacement batteries and target devices, checking specifications and ensuring safe installation.

device_model.description: Exact device model requiring battery replacement

replacement_dimensions.description: Battery dimensions as [length, width, thickness] in mm

error_messages: Device model not found: Provide a valid device model from supported manufacturers.
Invalid battery specifications: Voltage must be between 3.0-4.5V, capacity between 100-10000 mAh.
Dimension mismatch: Replacement battery dimensions don't fit device compartment.
Voltage incompatibility: Replacement voltage differs significantly from original specification.
Capacity warning: Significantly higher capacity may cause charging or thermal issues.
Invalid dimensions array: Provide exactly 3 dimensions [length, width, thickness] in mm.
usage: Input device model and all replacement battery specifications. The tool will verify compatibility and highlight any concerns.

compatibility_status.description: Compatibility result: compatible, compatible with warnings, incompatible

physical_fit.description: Whether battery will physically fit in device

capacity_comparison.description: Capacity comparison with original: higher, same, lower
